components.custom-code-plugin__code:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    const wrapper = document.querySelector('.cd-words-wrapper');
    const divs = wrapper.querySelectorAll(':scope > *');
    document.querySelectorAll('.cd-headline.slide b.is-visible:not(:first-of-type)')
      .forEach(el => el.classList.remove('is-visible'))
    let currentIndex = 0;
    console.log({
      wrapper, divs, currentIndex}
               )
    setInterval(function() {
      // Remove 'is-visible' class from current div
      divs[currentIndex].classList.remove('is-visible');
      // Move to the next div
      currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % divs.length;
      // Add 'is-visible' class to the new current div
      divs[currentIndex].classList.add('is-visible');
    }
                , 5000);
  }
                           );
</script>

components.content: You are in the right place !
Free minds need free tools to make the world a better place

Whether you’re a maker about to create a website for the first time or you’re a pro designer or coder making websites for customers, you will love Silex. You have two ways to start: open Silex and start with one of the a free website provided with Silex, or follow a tutorial before you play with the tool. You can always add advanced functionality to your website with code - HTML, CSS, Javascript. It’s time to get your professional website.
Use the instance provided Silex Labs for free, no installation, store your data in your Dropbox, Owncloud, GitHub or FTP, get started immediately!

settings.name: Page
settings.eleventyPermalink: [{"type":"property","propType":"field","fieldId":"fixed","label":"Fixed value","kind":"scalar","typeIds":["String"],"options":{"value":"{% if lang != \"en\" %}/{{lang}}{% endif %}{% if pagination.items[0].flatData.type != \"page\" %}/{{ pagination.items[0].flatData.type }}{% endif %}{% if pagination.items[0].flatData.slug != empty %}/{{ pagination.items[0].flatData.slug | slugify }}{% endif %}/"}}]
settings.head:
<style>
  .no-padding-between + .no-padding-between {
    padding-top: 0;
  }
  .no-padding-between:has( + .no-padding-between) {
    padding-bottom: 0;
  }
  .grid-2-alternate:nth-child(even) .grid-2 {
    flex-direction: row-reverse;
  }
  @media (max-width: 992px) {
  .grid-2-alternate:nth-child(even) .grid-2 {
  flex-direction: column-reverse;
}}
  
</style>


<link rel="canonical" href="{{ url }}{% if lang != "en" %}/{{lang}}{% endif %}{% if pagination.items[0].flatData.type != "page" %}/{{ pagination.items[0].flatData.type }}{% endif %}{% if pagination.items[0].flatData.slug != empty %}/{{ pagination.items[0].flatData.slug | slugify }}{% endif %}/">

{% assign item = pagination.items | first %}
{%- if lang == "en" %}
	{%- assign alt-lang = "fr" %}
    {%- assign alt-slug = item.flatData.slugFr %}
	{%- if alt-slug == blank %}
		{%- assign alt-url = "/fr/" %}
	{%- else %}
		{%- assign alt-url = "/fr/" | append: alt-slug | append: "/" %}
	{%- endif %}
{%- else %}
	{%- assign alt-lang = "en" %}
    {%- assign alt-slug = item.flatData.slugEn %}
	{%- if alt-slug == blank %}
		{%- assign alt-url = "/" %}
	{%- else %}
		{%- assign alt-url = "/" | append: alt-slug | append: "/" %}
	{%- endif %}
{%- endif %}


<meta property="og:locale:alternate" content="{{ alt-lang }}">
<meta property="og:locale" content="{{ lang }}">
<link rel="alternate" hreflang="{{ alt-lang }}" href="{{ url }}{{ alt-url }}" data-concat>

settings.title: {{ pagination.items[0].flatData.title }}
settings.og:title: {{ pagination.items[0].flatData.title }}
